bug.author: tbenst
bug.description: Currently, <denchmark-link:http://pyro.ai/examples/intro_part_ii.html#Parametrized-Stochastic-Functions-and-Variational-Inference>this page</denchmark-link> links to a <denchmark-link:http://pyro.ai/examples/causal_inference.html>causal inference tutorial</denchmark-link> , which does not exist.

comments.comment: Yeah, good catch, that didn't make it into 0.1.0. I'll remove the reference.

that link has been removed and will be reinstated when the causal tutorial is written. feel free to track its progress in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/pull/455>#455</denchmark-link>
